thread.title: Sistine Stallone is cheered on by mum and sister at LFW | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Sistine Stallone is cheered on by mum and sister at LFW | Daily Mail Online

author: Becky Freeth For Mailonline
title: Sistine Stallone is cheered on by mum and sister at LFW | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now Owning the catwalk: Stella Maxwell (left) was among the models to lead the show On the front row, her model mother Jennifer was no doubt familiar with the rules of the runway. Jennifer modelled from the age of 19, having signed with Elite Modeling Agency and even enjoyed an acting cameo in Rocky V. Out of the spotlight, Sistine's elder sister Sophia, 20, is a communications major at the University of Southern California. She has dreams of being an entrepreneur and creating her own fashion and makeup line. Spring-ready: Sistine was dressed in one of the forthcoming season's delightful dresses They are both big sisters to 14-year-old Scarlet, who is currently finishing at high school. The trio had their first foray into the spotlight as a threesome last month when they shared the role of Golden Globes' Miss Golden Globe 2017. Sistine, Sophia and Scarlet made their mum and dad proud as they helped the winners of this year's awards on and off the red carpet. Proud: Sophia and Jennifer were there to support her on her British catwalk debut Share or comment on this article 101
